original_title: The Doctors: The Paul McGann Years
overview: Theis documentary contains the best in-depth interviews with Paul McGann (the Eighth Doctor), Daphne Ashbrook (Grace Holloway), Yee Jee Tso (Chang Lee), Eric Roberts (The Master), Philip Segal (Producer) and Geoffrey Sax (Director). Presented by Sophie Aldred, Robert Dick and the voice of the Daleks Nicholas Briggs.
tagline: Meet the stars from TVâ€™s top Science Fiction series!
title: The Doctors: The Paul McGann Years
